author: Aakash Jhaveri
title: How WhatsApp is tackling the spread of fake news during COVID-19
description: Here are the measures adopted by WhatsApp to control the spread of fake news and misinformation.
content:
WhatsApp has gone on to become the texting app of choice for billions around the world. With so many using it as their primary source of information exchange, it comes as no surprise that there is a fair amount of fake news that gets propagated by the app.
